Pre-Game Insights: Armenia take on Latvia at Republican Stadium - Vazgen Sargsyan in one of the matches in round one of the group phase of the UEFA Nations League this season.
Armenia are ranked number 97 in the FIFA world ranking, while Latvia are ranked number 137.
Armenia lost twice in their last three matches, as they were defeated 2-1 by Czech Republic and 2-1 against Slovenia, but won 2-1 against Kazakhstan.
Latvia came through the last three games without a win, recording two draws and one loss.
Armenia have not kept a clean sheet in their last 21 matches.
Both teams have been involved in matches with few goals recently, suggesting a close encounter is expected.
